mapper.select: select userid,pic_file,alert_date,doc_date,doc_num ,DISTNACE_WGS84(${lon}, ${lat}, lon, lat) as DISTANCE from board where userid=#{userid} and alert_date<=sysdate and ((lon between ${lon}-0.019 and ${lon}+0.019) and (lat between ${lat}-0.022 and ${lat}+0.022)) and rownum=1 order by distance
